channel.title: package on Bas-Man's Musings
channel.description: Recent content in package on Bas-Man's Musings

item.title: Swift: Deconstruct SPF
item.description:
Hi,

I have been working on this project on and off for a bit now. So I thought it was time to go over how we might be able to not only internally document our code, but also to document it at the package level.

item.title: Swift: Deconstruct SPF Getting Started
item.description: In my previous series “Learning Rust”. I decided to attempt to learn some fairly basic rust concepts and constructs by working on a fairly simple project. This seemed to go fairly well. So I am now going to attempt to work on the same project, but this time, using Swift.
